definition: positive and negative/pros and cons/inside and outside
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
two-way/reversible/both sides of the coin

sentences.english: Every option has its pros and cons.
sentences.chinese: 每一项选择都具有正反两面性。

sentences.english: For me, personally, I can really see both sides to the coin.
sentences.chinese: 我个人来说，我看到了这个问题的正反面。

sentences.english: We can discuss it and pro-and-con it.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以讨论甚至从正反两方面辩论这件事。

sentences.english: Love and pain are two sides of one coin, the coin of your emotional life.
sentences.chinese: 爱和痛是人的情感硬币的正反两面。

sentences.english: This is a positive feedback process.
The controversies are those about matters as to which there is no good.
sentences.chinese: 最激烈的争论乃是关于正反两方都无充分证据的事物。

sentences.english: "I hope the debate goes slowly, " he says, "because there are risks on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 我希望辩论缓慢地进行，因为正反两方面都存在风险。

sentences.english: One ought to draw the positive and negative historical lessons.
sentences.chinese: 大家应当吸取正反两面的历史教训。

sentences.english: Weigh the pros and cons of each choice.
sentences.chinese: 衡量每个选择的正反两面。

sentences.english: They argued the matter pro and con.
sentences.chinese: 他们对此事正反两面地争论着。

sentences.english: These cases offer experiences and lessons for building a native strong catering brand of Tongren.
sentences.chinese: 为建设铜仁本土强势餐饮品牌提供正反经验借鉴。

sentences.english: You must be prompt, have good record with positive feedback.
sentences.chinese: 你必须迅速，有正反馈的良好记录。

sentences.english: The impulsive controller is designed to switch the in-phase synchronization state and the anti-phase synchronization state.
sentences.chinese: 设计了脉冲控制器，实现了正反相同步间的动态切换。

sentences.english: Ambivalence or disagreeableness in a close relationship arises now.
sentences.chinese: 亲近关系中会出现正反感情并存或不同意见。

sentences.english: Could you copy these both onto one piece of paper using the front and back?
sentences.chinese: 你能把这份文件复印在同一张纸的正反两方吗？

definition: two-way/reversible/both sides of the coin
reverse side/backside/the other side (of a problem etc)/negative/bad
the two poles/the north and south poles/both ends of sth/electric or magnetic poles
yin and yang
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
magnetic pole
positive and negative
duality/dual/bipolar/binary
to turn upside down/to reverse/back to front/confused/deranged/crazy
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
to rotate/to revolve/to spin/to whirl
mutual repulsion (e.g. electrostatic)/to repel one another
life and death
mutually exclusive
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
vacuum
